page.title: 20LEISURE TIME ACTIVITIES.
page.content: Sometimes I go to Elmwood Youth Club but I find it very boring. I hang around Oxbridge but that's boring too. I'm hardly ever in to watch television before 10.30p.m. but it's usually only news or politics on then. I like most of the music in 'the charts' be it punk, electro mod or whatever. I have a taste for all sorts of music. My evening timetable is:- Mon., Wed.-- Oxbridge; Tue.-- Bentleys Disco; Thur. --Youth Club; Fri.--Billingham ice rink; Sat-Sun.-- go to my Dad's. {Gareth Codling 15 I like rugby,football, basketball and hockey. I also play pool or snooker at the pool hall. T.V. is just a joke with boring programmes like Coronation St., Emmerdale Farm and Crossroads. I prefer The Young Ones, Spitting Images and music shows but not Top Of The Pops.{Nicholas Hodgson 15
